Text:
â€œFree Agentsâ€ focuses on Alex (Hank Azaria) who is recently divorced and Helen (Kathryn Hahn), who lost her fiance many years ago. The two of them work for a PR company and have no intentions or readiness to jump back into the dating pool again. However, they find themselves in bed with each other. Despite the encounter, they say that they want to remain friends, but always find a way to get back into bed together no matter how hard Helen pushes away. Meanwhile, the office tries to hook Alex up with dates and get him back in the game. Stephen (Anthony Head) is their boss and keeps trying to convince Alex to be his new wing man. When Alex goes on a date, Helen realizes that she is jealous and they find that they keep sleeping with one another because of it.

Al Madrigal, Anthony Stewart Head, Hank Azaria, Joe Lo Truglio, Kathryn Hahn, Mo Mandel
